name: ECM
author: Nipype (interface)
description:
ECM, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.afni.preprocess, interface: ECM).
Performs degree centrality on a dataset using a given maskfile via the 3dECM command
For complete details, see the `3dECM Documentation. <https://afni.nimh.nih.gov/pub/dist/doc/program_help/3dECM.html>`_

inputs.name: Args
inputs.description: A string. Additional parameters to the command.

inputs.name: Autoclip
inputs.description: A boolean. Clip off low-intensity regions in the dataset.

inputs.name: Automask
inputs.description: A boolean. Mask the dataset to target brain-only voxels.

inputs.name: Eps
inputs.description: A float. Sets the stopping criterion for the power iteration; :math:`l2\|v_\text{old} - v_\text{new}\| < eps\|v_\text{old}\|`; default = 0.001.

inputs.name: Fecm
inputs.description: A boolean. Fast centrality method; substantial speed increase but cannot accommodate thresholding; automatically selected if -thresh or -sparsity are not set.

inputs.name: Full
inputs.description: A boolean. Full power method; enables thresholding; automatically selected if -thresh or -sparsity are set.

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Input file to 3decm.

inputs.name: Mask
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Mask file to mask input data.

inputs.name: Max iter
inputs.description: An integer. Sets the maximum number of iterations to use in the power iteration; default = 1000.

inputs.name: Memory
inputs.description: A float. Limit memory consumption on system by setting the amount of gb to limit the algorithm to; default = 2gb.

inputs.name: Num threads
inputs.description: An integer. Set number of threads.

inputs.name: Scale
inputs.description: A float. Scale correlation coefficients in similarity matrix to after shifting, x >= 0.0; default = 1.0 for -full, 0.5 for -fecm.

inputs.name: Shift
inputs.description: A float. Shift correlation coefficients in similarity matrix to enforce non-negativity, s >= 0.0; default = 0.0 for -full, 1.0 for -fecm.

inputs.name: Sparsity
inputs.description: A float. Only take the top percent of connections.

inputs.name: Thresh
inputs.description: A float. Threshold to exclude connections where corr <= thresh.

output-files.name: Out file
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Output image file name.

output-files.name: Out file
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Output file.
